component.name: ThemedLabel
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedLabel:Init"
scene = m.top.getScene() themeChangeNotifier = scene.findNode("themeChangeNotifier") themeChangeNotifier.observeFieldScoped("title", "ThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub ThemeChanged()
print "ThemedLabel:ThemeChanged"
m.top.color = m.global.theme[m.top.themeColor]
End Sub
